short_summary: Parks Canada requires 6 Electric Vehicle Chargers.
description: Parks Canada Agency has a requirement for six (6) EV (Electric Vehicle) chargers for their Nova Scotia locations. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HN-21EVSE/B. If you wish to become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hn-373-80467. As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on canadabuys.canada.ca for a period of ten (10) calendar days. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is by March 31, 2024. Debriefings Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone or in person.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Title:** Electric Vehicle Chargers
**Reference Number:** cb-770-71443057
**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** February 9, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2024 at 2:00 PM

**Description:**
Parks Canada is soliciting proposals for the supply of electric vehicle chargers for their Nova Scotia locations. The requirement is for six (6) units to be delivered by March 31, 2024.

**Bid Restrictions:**
This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HN-21EVSE/B. Suppliers who wish to become pre-qualified under this RFSA should refer to the following website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hn-373-80467](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hn-373-80467).

**Delivery and Payment Terms:**
The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is March 31, 2024. Suppliers are expected to comply with the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement.

**Debriefings:**
Bidders who are unsuccessful in their bid submission may request a debriefing from the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of receiving notification of their bid's outcome.

**Eligible Countries:**
This tender is open to suppliers from the following countries that are signatories to a free trade agreement with Canada:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
Julianne Cox, Procurement Officer
Phone: (343) 585-1324
Email
